actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend Title 26, United States Code, to require the Secretary of the Treasury to disclose certain information from the files of the Internal Revenue Service to the Secretary of Veterans Affairs for the purpose of verifying entitlement to, and determining the correct amount of, title 38, United States Code, pension benefits.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit disclosure to the Department of Veterans Affairs of income-related tax return information for the purpose of verifying entitlement to, and determining the correct amount of, veterans' pensions and benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend Title 26, United States Code, to require the Secretary of the Treasury to disclose certain information from the files of the Internal Revenue Service to the Secretary of Veterans Affairs for the purpose of verifying entitlement to, and determining the correct amount of, title 38, United States Code, pension benefits.
